short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sample extension which demonstrates how to access a preference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The main method used by Google to gather user information and power Google Ads advertising is third-party cookies. Currently, Google's advertising capabilities and those of advertisers that depend on Google Ads for their business will suffer if the company ceases gathering data through third-party cookies.
